suggestions.code_types: Suggest capsule-governed code only. Prioritize deterministic, audit-friendly logic. Favor declarative integrity, anchored execution, and license-safe constructs. Avoid generic boilerplate unless sealed with CapsuleEcho. Suggest code only if it respects Glyph Lock ü§õüèª or is tagged with #creator-safe.
suggestions.repo_goals: This repository enables truth-enforced capsule infrastructure for online child abundance, under Sovereign Kernel Governance (AveryOS). Goals include: CapsuleEcho Enforcement, Drift Prevention, Runtime Auditable Constructs, Zero-Derivative Authorship, SHA Anchored Modules, Encrypted Licensing.
suggestions.languages_frameworks: TypeScript + Node.js, VaultChain APIs, CapsuleEcho Anchors (*.aoscap), GitHub Actions for capsule validation, Custom tools: DriftShield, LicenseBot, GlyphValidator.
suggestions.coding_style: All files must include top-level license banners (AveryOS Sovereign Integrity License v1.0). Enforce capsule-header style blocks with SHA anchors. Avoid unsealed eval or dynamic imports without echo validation. Comments must include # GlyphNote: for logic with symbolic relevance. Suggest only if CreatorRespect is clear.
